EmailTemplate.name: Global_Website_HAWQ_Downloads.HAWQ Inquiry
EmailTemplate.subject: HAWQ Download Availability for Pivotal HD Community
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Download Your 60-Day Free Trial Now <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/pivotal-data-fabric/pivotal-hd#4> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for your initial inquiry to add HAWQ’s advanced SQL features to your Pivotal HD Community deployment.
HAWQ is now available for download <http://www.gopivotal.com/pivotal-products/pivotal-data-fabric/pivotal-hd#4> with your Pivotal HD Community deployment for a 60-Day free trial.
Pivotal HD Community is supported by you – the Community. If you have any questions, comments, etc, please join our discussion forum <http://www.gopivotal.com/community/pivotal-hd>.
Thank you,
The Pivotal Team Check out Pivotal P.O.V. Visit our blog >> <blog.gopivotal.com> Exploring Pivotal HD Single Node Watch now >> <http://bitcast-a.v1.o1.sjc1.bitgravity.com/greenplum/pivotalvideo/Webinar-08062013-PHD.m4v>
